```{r setup}
library(rCAX)
```

## Show the available tables

Only the name and id columns are shown.
```{r}
rcax_tables(cols=c("name", "id"))
```

## Get a NOSA table for a popid

Here the columns are restricted.
```{r}
rcax_nosa(popid=7, cols=c("popid", "spawningyear", "nosaij", "nosaej"))
```

## Get a NOSA table with all the columns

```{r}
a <- rcax_nosa(popid=7, cols=NULL)
colnames(a)
```
